page.title: 17Why Burley is Popular.
page.content: Burley is a popular tourist village and we asked groups of tourists in one day why they liked Burley. Eleven people were interviewed. They came from: Leicester,Staines,Watford,Wareham, Kent,Essex,Devonshire,Ashley Heath, Lancashire,Chesterfield and Stevenage. Most people had seen the village.The things that they liked best were the ponies,forest,cleanness, shops and Burley being peaceful and quiet. Everybody we talked to liked Burley very much. They were all here for a holiday apart from the people from Wareham and Ashley Heath.They would all come to Burley if they had the chance.Most of them come here every year for a holiday.They come here for the forest and the rest and the sunshine. By Alistair Stewart Stuart Newbury.
